content:
For me the biggest news was IronRuby moving to github along with a more "open" structure.  Far overshadowed the 1.0 alpha 2 release for me!

http://github.com/ironruby/ironruby/tree/master

"Sesh has promised “weekly code drops”."

Here it is - http://www.codeplex.com/dlr/SourceControl/ListDownloadableCommits.aspx. My blog post on the same is here - http://blogs.msdn.com/seshadripv/archive/2008/12/04/codeplex-com-dlr-is-now-setup-to-receive-regular-source-updates.aspx
